process_type.description: Select the type of preprocessed data to use.<<0>> do not import preprocessed data. <<1>> use raw data. <<2>> Import preprocessed data

type_list.name: preprocessed_data
type_list.description: Preprocessed data params. You can not remove the <<SubID>> generic part

clean_data.description: Clean EEG channels with external Toolbox (Removing and interpolating channels)

select_events.by_description: Default:<<empty>>. Selection of the data by <<marks>> way or <<segments>> way
select_events.events_description: Type the events that you want to select from the data. If you want to extract all data leave the events list empty. For select a specific event fill the list like the events_example tab
